game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.beginning: In the world of Eridoria, where magic and technology coexist in an uneasy balance, players take on the role of archaeologists seeking to uncover the secrets of the fabled Lost City of Eldarath.
game.synopsis: The Lost City of Eldarath is an epic adventure game where players explore ancient ruins, uncover hidden treasures, and unravel the mysteries of the city's downfall. As they delve deeper into the story, they must navigate complex moral dilemmas and make choices that impact the world around them.
